verify.name: Verify blkid command output
verify.hint: The blkid command should return information about the block devices, including the filesystem type. Verify that the output contains "TYPE=\"ext4\"".

verify.name: Verify blkid filesystem type filtering
verify.hint: The blkid command should be able to filter the output to only show block devices with the ext4 filesystem type. Verify that the output contains "TYPE=\"ext4\"".

verify.name: Verify blkid disk attribute query
verify.hint: The blkid command should be able to display the UUID for the /dev/sda1 block device. Verify that the output contains the expected UUID value.
